issue.message: This call references a method added in API level 28; however, the containing class androidx.slidingpanelayout.widget.SlidingPaneLayout is reachable from earlier API levels and will fail run-time class verification.

This call references a method added in API level 16; however, the containing class androidx.slidingpanelayout.widget.SlidingPaneLayout is reachable from earlier API levels and will fail run-time class verification.
